title: Alex Jones Show - 2014 Apr 17 TH [sebaygo1]
description:
The Alex Jones Show 
Thursday, 17 April 2014


[sebaygo1]


Show Description
................
From the Infowars web site :: On this Thursday, April 17 edition of The Alex Jones Show, Alex looks at the latest on the BLM targeting of Cliven Bundy and his family as news surfaces about the feds slaughtering the rancherÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s cattle and destroying his property as part of the Obama administration's "culture of intimidation" against all who dare resist leviathan government. Alex looks at the likely prospect of a coming repeat of the federal assault in Nevada, this time with possibly deadly consequences. 

Renowned journalist, author and speaker Nomi Prins returns to the show today. Prins, a former managing director at Goldman Sachs who also worked at Bear Stearns, Lehman Brothers and Chase Manhattan Bank, is a member of the Federal Reserve Reform Advisory Council. Nomi's latest book is All the Presidents' Bankers: The Hidden Alliances that Drive American Power, an incisive look a century of tight, personal relationships and interdependence between America's past 19 presidents and key bankers.

 prescription for ignorance. I try to share information
 that counters the monotone of mainstream corporate media.
